author: ghudson
msg: APR-ize the socket and process-forking code.
* include/svn_error_codes.h (SVN_ERR_RA_SVN_CONNECTION_FAILURE): No
longer needed.  Renumber the other error codes since there's no real
usage yet; ordinarily that wouldn't be kosher.
* include/svn_ra_svn.h, libsvn_ra_svn/marshal.c, libsvn_ra_svn/ra_svn.h
(svn_ra_svn_conn_st): Change sock to an apr_socket_t *.
(svn_ra_svn_create_conn): Accept an apr_socket_t * instead of an int.
* libsvn_ra_svn/client.c
(parse_url): No need to htons the port any more.
(make_connection): APR-ize, and take an apr_socket_t **.
(cleanup_conn): No longer needed; apr_socket_t has its own cleanup.
(ra_svn_open): Adjust socket type and punt cleanup.
(ra_svn_close): APR-ize.
* libsvn_ra_svn/marshal.c
(writebuf_flush, writebuf_write, readbuf_fill, readbuf_read): APR-ize.
* svnserve/main.c
(main): APR-ize socket stuff.  Don't detach until just before the
main loop, so that the user can see errors from binding the server
socket.  Also APR-ize process forking.  If APR_HAS_FORK isn't
defined, serve one connection at a time; it's better than nothing.

author: cmpilato
msg: First step in Issue 830 -- disallow the bogosity that results in
missing data.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c
(harvest_committables): Error out if we can't get a copyfrom URL for
an item that is intended to be copied.
(do_item_commit): Validate commit items that are earmarked for copying.
(svn_client__condense_commit_items): Enhance the debugging output here.

author: ghudson
msg: Revert last change, since ra_svn isn't part of the default build.

author: cmpilato
msg: set some svn:ignore properties

author: gstein
msg: Disable the ra_svn stuff from the default build, pending the
resolution of some issues.
